title: Jessica Mauboy CONFIRMS engagement to Themeli Magripilis
text:
Former Australian Idol star Jessica Mauboy has confirmed her engagement to long-term partner Themeli Magripilis.

As the couple flew into Sydney Airport on Tuesday, the 30-year-old singer revealed Themeli had proposed last month while they were on holiday in Kalymnos, Greece.

After being asked about the engagement rumours, she happily told paparazzi: 'It is very exciting. It was a big surprise in fact, it was pretty crazy!'

'I didn't expect it!' Jessica Mauboy confirmed her engagement to Themeli Magripilis as the couple flew into Sydney Airport on Tuesday, after he proposed on holiday in Greece

Themeli is believed to have proposed to Jessica on Palionisos Beach with a diamond ring, after 10 years of dating.

'I didn't expect it at all... in the future, but not that soon,' Jessica said, giggling.

She added: 'It was lovely, the family were all there and it was nice to have everyone around and the closest people that have seen me grow over the years and become the person I am today. It was very, very special.'

Beaming: After being asked about the engagement rumours, Jessica happily told paparazzi, 'It is very exciting. It was a big surprise in fact, it was pretty crazy!'

Love looks good on her! The former Australian Idol star looked positively radiant as she jetted into Sydney after her long-haul flight from Europe

Meanwhile, the We Got Love hitmaker looked positively radiant as she jetted into Sydney after her long-haul flight from Europe.

She wore a white T-shirt, blue jeans and sneakers, and kept her hands hidden from view in the pockets of her beige winter coat.

But she did offer a split-second glimpse of her diamond ring as an assistant helped load her luggage into the back of a taxi.

Spotted! She offered a split-second glimpse of her diamond ring as an assistant helped load her luggage into the back of a taxi

Special moment: Themeli is believed to have proposed to Jessica on Palionisos Beach

Themeli, a soccer player from the Northern Territory, reportedly sought approval from his family in Greece before asking Jessica to marry him.

They first met on a night out more than a decade ago, and spent seven years in a long-distance relationship before he relocated to Sydney in 2016.

The couple are now living together in Jessica's $1.8million two-level apartment.
description: Former Australian Idol star Jessica Mauboy has confirmed her engagement to long-term partner Themeli Magripilis.
authors: Candice Jackson For Daily Mail Australia
